body: Sorry everyone, I can't help catch hackers when i'm at school, :( I wish i could, but atlas i can't.  But i can see the punishment board here at school so gratz to the mods that have caught these hackers with out me <3 But i'll be home in about 20/25 mins so wait for me <3 i'll come on the server sometime between 1:20/2:00 Pm.

title: I wish i could be on more :(

replies.body:
these posts are really pointless on the forums and i think theyre considered spam topics


im no staff when it comes to this, but as far as i know - creating more of these topics will result in forum ban/tempban, just sayin

replies.body:
Hey there,

As {tag=9116d3fa14004adaaecd2eae1d73e383} stated, posts like these aren't allowed since they are regarding one player. Please refrain from creating these type of posts or you will eventually be punished! See you Ingame, cheers!

Regards, {tag=38cc237d92724e01ad24f5b0110130c1}|Josh
